languages.text:
Servo Skull has +20 Intelligence
At the beggining of Overseer's turn Servoskull lowers Burning, Bleeding and Toxin of all allies in {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} area by -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
At the end of Overseer's turn, their Servoskull explodes like a {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}Fire Grenade{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Servo Skull has +20 Intelligence
At the beggining of Overseer's turn Servoskull lowers Burning, Bleeding and Toxin of all allies in {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} area by -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
At the end of Overseer's turn, their Servoskull explodes like a {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}Fire Grenade{/g}.

languages.text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, allies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm have their {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} level reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
At the end of the Overseer's turn, their servo-skull swarm explodes, mimicking the effects of {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}fire grenade{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Рой сервочерепов получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}.
В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} для союзников в 4 клетках от роя уровень {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} уменьшается на {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
В конце хода надзирателя его рой сервочерепов взрывается, производя эффект {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}огненной гранаты{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, allies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm have their {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} level reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
At the end of the Overseer's turn, their servo-skull swarm explodes, mimicking the effects of {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}fire grenade{/g}.

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsü, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimlerin {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} seviyeleri {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} kadar azalır.
Gözetmen'in turu sona erdiğinde, kendi hizmelet sürüsü bulunduğu hücrede patlayarak {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}ateş bombası{/g} ile aynı tesiri yaratır.

The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, allies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm have their {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} level reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
At the end of the Overseer's turn, their servo-skull swarm explodes, mimicking the effects of {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}fire grenade{/g}.

Gözetmen'in turu sona erdiğinde, kendi hizmelet sürüsü bulunduğu hücrede patlayarak {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}ateş bombası{/g} ile aynı tesiri yaratır.

Hizmelet sürüsü, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimlerin {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}zehir{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} seviyeleri {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} kadar azalır.
Gözetmen'in turu sona erdiğinde, kendi hizmelet sürüsü bulunduğu hücrede patlayarak {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}ateş bombası{/g} ile aynı tesiri yaratır.

languages.text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, los aliados situados en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al enjambre de servocráneos reducen en −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} sus niveles de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.
Al final del turno del supervisor, su enjambre de servocráneos explota imitando los efectos de una {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}granada incendiaria{/g}.

At the end of the Overseer's turn, their servo-skull swarm explodes, mimicking the effects of {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}fire grenade{/g}.

Al final del turno del supervisor, su enjambre de servocráneos explota imitando los efectos de una {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}granada incendiaria{/g}.

languages.text:
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高20点。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，距离伺服头骨集群4格内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}毒素{/g}等级降低{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}级。
监察官的回合结束时，伺服头骨集群引发爆炸，产生与{g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}烈焰手雷{/g}类似的效果。

监察官的回合结束时，伺服头骨集群引发爆炸，产生与{g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}烈焰手雷{/g}类似的效果。

languages.text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.
Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} wird bei Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm die Stufe von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} um -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} reduziert.Am Ende des Zuges des Aufsehers explodiert sein Servoschädel-Schwarm mit den Effekten einer {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}Feuergranate{/g}.

Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} wird bei Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm die Stufe von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} um -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} reduziert.Am Ende des Zuges des Aufsehers explodiert sein Servoschädel-Schwarm mit den Effekten einer {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}Feuergranate{/g}.

languages.text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +20.
Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, les alliés situés dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes voient le niveau des effets de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} qu'ils subissent réduit de -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
À la fin du tour du surveillant, son essaim de servocrânes explose, reproduisant les mêmes effets qu'une {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}grenade ardente{/g}.

At the end of the Overseer's turn, their servo-skull swarm explodes, mimicking the effects of {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}fire grenade{/g}.

L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +20.
Au début du tour du surveillant, les alliés situés dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes voient le niveau des effets de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} qu'ils subissent réduit de -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text:
サーヴォスカルスウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}が+20される。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、サーヴォスカルスウォームの半径4セルの味方は{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}のレベルが−{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}低下する。
監督者のターン終了時、サーヴォスカルスウォームは爆発し、{g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}ファイアグレネード{/g}の効果を模倣する。
languages.original_text:

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, allies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm have their {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} level reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
At the end of the Overseer's turn, their servo-skull swarm explodes, mimicking the effects of {g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}fire grenade{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サーヴォスカルスウォームの知性が+20される。
監督者のターン開始時、サーヴォスカルスウォームの半径4セルの味方は炎上、毒、出血のレベルが−{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}低下する。
監督者のターン終了時、サーヴォスカルスウォームは爆発し、{g|f:9a7233892a414a52a5cd4fb4367a5d99}ファイアグレネード{/g}の効果を模倣する。
